import react, { Fragment, useEffect, useState } from 'react'; import './Homepage.css' import homeImg from '../../assets/Image/Homepage.png' export default function Homepage({ lightBg, horizontalAlign, topline, headline, description, img, altText }) { return (
{ horizontalAlign ?
{topline}

{headline}

{description}

: <>
{topline}
{description}
}
); }
